content.query:
-- 1. switch to use woca_ldw
USE woca_ldw
GO 

--1a. What are the individual age groups Counts
SELECT 
    age_group_name,
    COUNT(age_group_name) AS totals
FROM silver.Individual
WHERE age_group_name IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY age_group_name
ORDER BY totals DESC;


--*****Question: where is the dictionary/lookup to primary ethnicity
--2a. What are the Primary ethnicities
SELECT 
    primary_ethnicity,
    COUNT(primary_ethnicity) AS totals
FROM silver.Individual
WHERE primary_ethnicity IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY primary_ethnicity
ORDER BY totals DESC;

--2b. What are the top 10 Primary ethnicities
SELECT TOP 10
    primary_ethnicity,
    COUNT(primary_ethnicity) AS totals
FROM silver.Individual
WHERE primary_ethnicity IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY primary_ethnicity
ORDER BY totals DESC;



--3a. What are the primary tribes
SELECT 
    tribe_primary_name,
    COUNT(tribe_primary_name) AS totals
FROM silver.Individual
WHERE tribe_primary_name IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY tribe_primary_name
ORDER BY totals DESC;


--3b. What are the top 10 primary tribes
SELECT TOP 10
    tribe_primary_name,
    COUNT(tribe_primary_name) AS totals
FROM silver.Individual
WHERE tribe_primary_name IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY tribe_primary_name
ORDER BY totals DESC;
